title: Game wont open
body:
I try to launch LoL but it just goes to "PVP.net Kernel has stopped working" then dos'nt launch

help

replies.body:
This particular error is typically found if League isn't running with the right administrative privileges. I recommend launching league as admin by right-clicking on the shortcut and selecting *run as administrator*.

Please let me know if this worked for you.
worked like a charm, thanks a million
